response.overview: The film tells the story of a person named “Damo” who lived with his mother, despised in the neighborhood, worthless, but one day a rumor spread saying that “Damo” had won a billion cents in a betting game, so the treatment of the neighborhood’s residents turned to the opposite, as everyone began to flatter them. This was taken advantage of by Damo’s mother, who did not deny the rumor, but rather went along with it in the direction of establishing the respect due to them in the neighborhood.
response.title: إشاعة
